api_list.name: IP ADDRESS
api_list.description: JUST SEND AJAX OR REQUEST TO API.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://get-ip-address-and-basic-info.p.rapidapi.com/api.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-ip-address-and-basic-info.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://get-ip-address-and-basic-info.p.rapidapi.com/api.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-ip-address-and-basic-info.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
